text.headline: Production planner at Ecco Slovakia, a. s.
text.text: Started my career as a production planner in a shoe factory. I was responsible for planning the production schedule, managing resources, and ensuring timely delivery of products.

text.headline: SAP Master data specialist / Production master data
text.text: After a year, I transitioned to a role focused on SAP master data management. I was responsible for maintaining and updating production-related master data in the SAP system.

text.headline: Moving to IT department
text.text: In 2004, I made a career shift by moving to the IT department. This transition allowed me to leverage my production knowledge in IT projects.

text.headline: SAP Support
text.text: For following 2 years I was responsible for routings, production versions, and production orders in SAP and supporting business users in Production/Planning module.

text.headline: IT infrastructure projects - HyperV, MSSQL, Cisco
text.text: During this time I started to work on IT infrastructure projects including implementation of Hyper-V, maintenance of SQL servers and managing on-site network resources

text.headline: SAP re-implementation / Super user role for PP and WM modules
text.text: In 2008, I took on the role of 'super user' for the SAP PP and WM modules during a major re-implementation project.

text.headline: IT department manager
text.text:
In 2010, I was promoted to IT department manager responsible for overseeing the IT infrastructure, local app development, and user+pruduction support.

Responsibilities:

-server and network infrastructure

-business projects support

-introduction of new technologies

-local application development

-user support

-IT budget management

-team management

-project management

-vendor management

-IT security

text.headline: Telephone switchboard project
text.text: Led the project for upgrading legacy telephone switchboard system to new Alcatel solution .

text.headline: ASP.NET Intranet website
text.text:
Developed an intranet website using ASP.NET

supporting internal communication, reporting, business process control and document management.

text.headline: Electronic distribution system project
text.text:
Project manager and front-end developer for JIT distribution of materials to production lines.

Project team developed own logic and distribution timing

- multiple .NET WPF apps for matterial ordering and material requirements visualization

- integration with SAP system

- integration with RFID readers and BC scanners

text.headline: Clean agent fire suppression system
text.text: Installation of clean agent fire suppression system in local data center. This project involved planning, installation, and testing of the fire suppression system to ensure the safety of IT infrastructure.

text.headline: Senior RPA developer
text.text:
As a Senior RPA developer, I was responsible for designing and implementing Blue Prism robotic process automation solutions.

Responsibilities:

-Analyzing business processes and identifying automation opportunities

-Developing and deploying RPA solutions using Blue Prism

-Collaborating with business stakeholders to gather requirements

-Providing support and maintenance for existing RPA solutions

-Training and mentoring junior developers

-Managing Blue Prism infrastructure

text.headline: Custom ecosystem for Blue Prism operations
text.text:
-solution includes reporting app, custom automation scheduler and robot services

-dynamic scheduling of automations

-dynamic resource pool sizing

-resulting in aprox. 60% license costs

text.headline: Adopting Python and AI
text.text:
In 2024, I began exploring Python and its applications in AI and machine learning.

This involved:

- Taking online courses to learn Python programming

- Experimenting with Open AI and Azure Open AI libraries

- Working on personal projects to apply my knowledge
